am_devices_dc_dbi_novatek.h File Reference

Driver for Novatek display panels with DBI interface (NT35510). More...

Detailed Description

Driver for Novatek display panels with DBI interface (NT35510).

#include "stdint.h"
#include "nema_dc.h"
#include "nema_dc_hal.h"
#include "nema_dc_mipi.h"
#include "nema_dc_regs.h"
#include "nema_dc_intern.h"
#include "nema_dc_dsi.h"
#include "nema_sys_defs.h"
#include "am_devices_display_types.h"
